name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant is a hardy and easy-to-care-for plant that thrives indoors. It has long, sword-shaped leaves and can tolerate low light conditions.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant known for its medicinal properties. It has thick, fleshy leaves that store water and is easy to grow indoors.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular indoor tree with large, glossy leaves. It adds a touch of elegance to any room and prefers bright, indirect light.

name: Jade Plant
description: The Jade Plant is a succulent with thick, glossy leaves. It symbolizes good luck and prosperity and is easy to care for indoors.

name: Succulent Mix
description: A mix of assorted succulent plants, perfect for creating a mini desert garden indoors. Easy to care for and requires minimal watering.

name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily is a beautiful flowering plant that thrives indoors. It has glossy green leaves and white flowers that bloom throughout the year.

name: Rubber Plant
description: The Rubber Plant is a popular indoor plant with large, glossy leaves. It is known for its air-purifying properties and easy care requirements.

name: Money Tree
description: The Money Tree is a symbol of good luck and prosperity. It has thick, braided trunks and glossy green leaves, making it an attractive indoor plant.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant is a low-maintenance indoor plant with glossy, dark green leaves. It can tolerate low light conditions and is drought tolerant.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: The Monstera Deliciosa is a trendy indoor plant with large, fenestrated leaves. It adds a tropical touch to any space and thrives in bright, indirect light.

name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a fragrant herb known for its calming properties. It produces beautiful purple flowers and is perfect for both indoor and outdoor gardens.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary is a versatile herb with fragrant, needle-like leaves. It is commonly used in cooking and can be grown indoors or outdoors in a sunny spot.

name: Cactus Mix
description: A mix of assorted cactus plants, perfect for creating a desert garden indoors or outdoors. Requires minimal watering and thrives in bright sunlight.

name: Bonsai Tree
description: A miniature tree grown in a pot, shaped to resemble a full-sized tree. Bonsai trees require careful pruning and training to maintain their form.

name: Sage
description: Sage is a perennial herb with aromatic gray-green leaves. It is commonly used in cooking and is known for its medicinal properties.

name: Peppermint
description: Peppermint is a refreshing herb with bright green leaves and a strong, minty aroma. It is perfect for teas, desserts, and aromatherapy.

name: Spider Plant
description: The Spider Plant is a popular indoor plant with long, arching leaves. It produces baby spider plants, or offsets, which can be repotted to grow new plants.

name: English Ivy
description: English Ivy is a fast-growing vine with small, lobed leaves. It is perfect for creating a green wall indoors or covering fences and walls outdoors.

name: Dwarf Lemon Tree
description: The Dwarf Lemon Tree is a compact citrus tree that produces fragrant flowers and juicy, tart lemons. It can be grown in a pot indoors or outdoors.

name: Bamboo Plant
description: Bamboo is a fast-growing plant that symbolizes good luck and prosperity. It is perfect for both indoor and outdoor settings and requires minimal care.
